items.sentence: It\'s likely to get cold tonight, so you may need an extra blanket.
Tom has gotten older and he doesn\'t go out as often as he used to.
It\'s not that I don\'t care, I just don\'t care as much as you do.
Tom should be more careful not to bother Mary while she\'s working.
Don\'t you think your French is good enough to explain the problem?
